name: Grilled Veggie Pasta Salad
description: Taste the differences of grilled veggie pasta .

ingredients.name: Small Red Onion, ,sliced into thick slices
Red Bell Pepper, halved and seeds removed

steps: 1) Preheat your oven to 400 degrees. Cut the whole head of garlic in half horizontally and drizzle it with a touch of oil. Wrap it tightly in aluminum foil and bake for about 45 minutes. Let cool completely
2) Bring a large pot of water up to a boil and salt it generously. Add the pasta and cook according to package instructions.
3) Heat a grill pan or you outdoor grill to medium high. Lightly coat the veggies with some oil and grill for about 4 to 5 minutes on each side.
5) In a large bowl, put the roasted garlic cloves (without the skin) the vinegar and oil and season with salt and pepper. Whisk until everything is combined and a vinaigrette has formed.

6) Chop your grilled veggies into bite size pieces and add in the bowl with the vinaigrette along with the drained pasta,olives and arugula. Let sit for about an hour before serving because it tastes better as it sits.
